net.realmproject.dcm.features.connection

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identity, Logging
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Heartbeat
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MjpegCamera

    public interface Connection
extends Identity, Logging
    Functionality for implementations which maintain a persistent connection to a device. Implementing the abstract methods of this class will allow it to manage a disconnect/reconnect cycle automatically. call startConnection to initialize
    Author:
    NAS

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Not to be called by client code.
      default void disconnected(java.lang.Exception exception)
      Client code should call this method when the device loses it's connection.
      default void doConnect()
      Not to be called by client code.
      default void initConnection()
      Client code should call this method to start the initial connection process on device initialization.
      default void logConnectionError(java.lang.Exception e) 
      void onConnect()
      Not to be called by client code.
      void onDisconnect(java.lang.Exception exception)
      Not to be called by client code.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.identity.Identity

        getId, setId

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.Logging

        getLog

    • Method Detail

      • initConnection

        default void initConnection()
        Client code should call this method to start the initial connection process on device initialization. This will begin the connection process.

      • doConnect

        default void doConnect()
        Not to be called by client code. Called whenever this device is disconnected. This method wraps the connect method with logging, error handling, and a call to onConnect after succeeding.

      • connect

        void connect()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Not to be called by client code. Called whenever this device is disconnected. This method should do whatever is necessary to connect the device to its destination.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on error

      • onConnect

        void onConnect()
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Not to be called by client code. Called whenever this device is newly connected. This method should do whatever setup is necessary to get the device to a consistent connected state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on error

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Not to be called by client code. Called whenever this device is disconnected. This method should do whatever cleanup is necessary to return the device to a consistent disconnected state.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception generated upon disconnection

      • disconnected

        default void disconnected(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Client code should call this method when the device loses it's connection. This will begin the reconnection process.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception generated upon disconnection

      • logConnectionError

        default void logConnectionError(java.lang.Exception e)
